Dana Teagle dot com.description: Web/software design & development profile and portfolio

Note Taken.description: Local storage notes app developed in Angular

Ontario Trans I.D. workshop - Nov 29 202.description: Free virtual workshop I'm presenting on Zoom on Nov 29, 2023 about how to change your name and/or gender marker in Ontario [hosted by CUPE 3903 Trans Feminist Action Caucus (TFAC)]

The Art Against Apartheid toolkit.description: A collection of 100 posters made by artists from across the world in solidarity with Palestine for use in community spaces, in galleries, and in the streets

No Tech for Apartheid.description: Petition to Amazon & Google to stop supporting the genocide of Palestinians in Gaza [Nov 2023]

House of Commons petition e-4649.description: Petition to the Prime Minister to take the necessary measures to address the Israel-Palestine conflict [closes Nov 23, 2023]

House of Commons petition e-4661.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to sanction the state of Israel for its continued ongoing violations of International law [closes Dec 9, 2023]

House of Commons petition e-4552.description: Petition to the House of Commons to increase Canada's humanitarian assistance in Sudan [closes Dec 23, 2023]

House of Commons petition e-4667.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to budget the necessary funds for the Canada Disability Benefit into the federal expenditures [closes Feb 1, 2024]

House of Commons petition e-4666.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to implement the recommendations from the White Paper on the Status of Trans and Gender Diverse People [closes Mar 7, 2024]

All the Walls Will Fall.description: 2023 Palestinian liberation resource list [curated by the Palestinian Youth Movement]

Anti-Trans Legislative Risk Map.description: Resource tracking the risk levels of anti-trans legislation and policy in Canadian provinces [maintained by Celeste Trianon]

Justice Trans.description: Justice & legal info for Two Spirit, trans, non-binary, and gender non-conforming communities across Canada

Digital Transgender Archive.description: Archive of digitized and born-digital materials relating to the history of trans people

National Network of Abortion Funds.description: Network of 100 independent abortion funds working to remove financial and logistical barriers to abortion access

Donate A Mask.description: Free delivery of N95 masks and/or COVID rapid tests to individuals, familes, and organizations across Canada

Kofi.description: For supporting me and my work
